server

Class ProjectDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ProjectDAO

  • public class ProjectDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to implement the communication between the server and the actual database, specifically concerning projects. Contains methods to add and access projects in the database.
    Author:
    jchip

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectDAO()
      Creates an instance of a ProjectDAO to interact with the database.

        Gets all the projects available for a specific user.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
